TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content: Yes, and your profile has a "Community Reputation" tab. The only reason to use like is because it's the name of the button, and to keep the LGG abbreviation. Care to offer a suggestion @Dman979?

I miss the old system of rep. I rarely received any, so it was always a "wow...!" moment every time I achieved any, especially when I actually received enough for another bar. I have actually thought about continuing to use the old system, just put the appropriate bar in my signature, until I reach the LGG... if that would be ok with y'all.

If not, I will begrudgingly just rely on the new system. Oh, and the rep or "likes" are even coming slower for me.

@Endersmens: sure!

I like the Rep Grand Group idea.

The new group has been posted! I don't think this thread will be locked, but I will put a big thing in the OP of this thread stating that the new group is in the other thread. I've also fixed most of the formatting issues on this OP (had to remove all the profile links past FlowerChild unfortunately, but whatevs)

Hope you guys enjoy!
